item.title: How the Trump-Zelensky Oval Office meeting spiraled into chaos
item.description: White House officials were expecting a positive meeting and said they had little reason to anticipate animosity before things deteriorated.

item.title: Fresh Musk emails to workers lead to renewed pushback at federal agencies
item.description: A fresh directive to workers ordering them to justify their employment weekly is still being met with resistance at the highest levels.
